text: Membrane protein: • Promotes virion assembly and release from cell-surface tetherins.
The envelope forms around the core from host cell membrane, when a progeny cell function (discussed shortly).
Virion component: virions, and to lessen immune response to the infected cell.
cells in which mitosis dissolves the nucleus.

Vif, Vpr, Vpu, Rev, Tat, Nef. 

Virion component:
electron-dense core particle (or capsid) surrounded by a the core contains spike proteins, which join the membrane to the matrix, as in influenza virus.
